page.title: 04Home Life
page.content: In the recent past it would have been true to describe home life at LINDEAN as unexceptional in so far as there were no divorcees or single-parent families in the area.As national statistics for these categories now show marked increases in both and as there have been no comparable changes in the survey area, LINDEAN must now be described as "exceptional".24 households comprise family units of parents and children living together.In addition,there are 6 instances of one or more grandparents of these families resident within the block.These figures suggest a close-knit community.In fact they represent a minority of the total number,the majority of families being best described as "bed-and-breakfast" householders.
